Description: Built a REST API using NodeJS and Express that allows adding movie reviews, contributing new movies, and following other people/users through interactions with a mongodb database.
Used Bootstrap and Pug to dynamically render data objects.
Designed algorithms in JavaScript to generate: movie recommendations, lists of similar movies for each movie, and frequent collaborators for each person.

Description: Built a fast food coupon web scraping web app that won best uiPath Hack at Ottawaâ€™s largest hackathon: CU Hacking.
Used uiPath, a Robotic Process Automation tool to scrape fast food coupon info from websites.
Implemented Bootstrap and custom CSS to display coupons in a grid of cards with thumbnails and links for redeeming.
